name: Lemon Cheese Cake
steps: Either chill crust for 2 hours or bake at 375 for 7 minutes
Cream butter and cream cheese. Add sugar and eggs. Blend well. Add half and half, blend well again 2-3  min. Add lemon juice and zest, blending well.
Pour into crust. Bake 40-45 min. Cool, then chill overnight.
